long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Skrum Screen Sharing

This application allows user to share their screen using Skrum Screen Sharing website: https://skrum.net/screenshare

For more information, please visit https://skrum.net
